Chess Club.description: Learn strategies and compete in chess tournaments

Programming Class.description: Learn programming fundamentals and build software projects

Soccer Team.description: Join the school soccer team and compete in matches

Basketball Team.description: Practice and play basketball with the school team

Art Club.description: Explore your creativity through painting and drawing

Drama Club.description: Act, direct, and produce plays and performances

Math Club.description: Solve challenging problems and participate in math competitions

Debate Team.description: Develop public speaking and argumentation skills

Music Club.description: Learn music theory, perform in concerts, and collaborate with fellow musicians

Orchestra.description: Play orchestral instruments and perform classical and contemporary pieces

Photography Club.description: Explore photography techniques, edit photos, and participate in photo exhibitions

Dance Club.description: Learn various dance styles and perform in school events

Creative Writing Club.description: Write poetry, short stories, and creative pieces; participate in workshops and readings

Film & Video Production.description: Create short films and videos, learn cinematography and editing techniques

Art Gallery & Sculpture.description: Create and exhibit sculptural works, explore 3D art forms

Choir.description: Sing in harmony, perform at concerts and school events
